Name: Pixel Planner
About the game: / A simple, free and fun to use planner app with many features to help keep you on track, without taking up a whole screen to give you the information. Alarm - Can be used as a straight alarm, repeatable, or tuned as a custom pomodoro productivity timer with the rest function. Deadline - A constant reminder of how long is left to a critical date, ticking down in real time. Note - Leave a simple note for yourself. Checklist - Create a checklist of tasks. Bookmark - Create a quick link to an app on your computer, or to a website. Group - Tap windows together to link them to show relationships. Folder - Tap windows with this to store inside, then tap the [open] button to release them again. Palette - Change the colors by loading any 4 color texture Make them easily and for free with the app below /
